publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4871 Carolyn Leckie: NHS Logistics—That the Parliament congratulates the NHS workers in England and Wales who are currently taking strike action to prevent the privatisation of NHS Logistics; expresses its concern at the worrying trend towards further privatisation of the NHS and other vital services both in Scotland and the rest of the United Kingdom, and believes that public services are best run for people and not for profit.

S2M-4871 Carolyn Leckie: NHS Logistics—That the Parliament congratulates the NHS workers in England and Wales who are currently taking strike action to prevent the privatisation of NHS Logistics; expresses its concern at the worrying trend towards further privatisation of the NHS and other vital services both in Scotland and the rest of the United Kingdom, and believes that public services are best run for people and not for profit.
S2M-4871 NHS Logistics (lodged on 26 September 2006) Colin Fox*, Frances Curran*, John Swinburne*, Campbell Martin*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-4871 NHS Logistics (lodged on 26 September 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*
